attributes.action: Reduce Income tax to 0% for those currently in the 10p starter tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently single people under 25 or working less than 30 hours a week cannot claim tax credits.

This means Gordon Brown's plan to increase the 10p band to 20p will hit this low income group the hardest.

Surely taking this group out of tax altogether will be the simplest way to help those on low incomes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
